item.title: Both Republicans and Democrats clash with RFK Jr. on vaccines, CDC turmoil
item.description: "We're denying people vaccines," Republican Sen. Bill Cassidy told Kennedy.

item.title: US job cuts soared in August, outplacement company says
item.description: Jobs cuts announced by U.S. firms climbed 39% last month, data shows.
